translations: n.[鸟] 涉禽；涉水者，跋涉者；长筒防水靴

phrs.translation: 涉禽, 防水连靴裤, 涉禽类

sentences.sentence: "All these wader and water birds have very similar feet, " Lockley.
sentences.translation: 劳克雷说，“所有这些涉禽和水鸟都长着相似的脚。”

sentences.sentence: My dad always wears his wader and fishing vest when he goes fishing.
sentences.translation: 我爸去钓鱼时都会穿他的防水长靴和钓鱼背心。

sentences.sentence: The hand line may be a useful aid even if the wader is belayed as below.
sentences.translation: 扶手绳甚至在渡溪者处于被确保状态下，都是个好用的帮手。
